short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that turns your YouTube into a tool for creators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Its packed with features that can speed up your content creation process significantly.
As well as help you come up with better video ideas, and manage your channels better.

Feature list:

+ Find similar channels in a niche & see their statistics
+ See shorts channel analytics in the shorts feed
+ Combine multiple channels' analytics into one overview & dashboard
+ View advanced metrics like average views, subscriber counts, outliers, views per hour, & more
+ Preview thumbnails
+ Take beautiful screenshots of videos to share online
+ Advanced filter tools for search, home page, and subscription feed (e.g., filter search by dates, view counts, channel subscriber counts & more)
+ Take screenshots of frames inside videos
+ Download thumbnails
+ Easily copy and paste transcriptions
+ Analyze comment section sentiments with a single click
+ Calculate your net profit inside your channel's dashboard
+ See channel's average views & audience demographic data
+ Check monetization status for channels
+ & many more!

Note: Monetization status checks and audience saturation scores are estimations and, although very accurate, are not 100% precise. There are some cases and channels where they might not function as expected.

____________________________

If you think it gives wrong results for particular channels, please reach contact@nexlev.io for feedback. We are happy to improve accuracy for particular cases!

1.8.2 updates:

+ Advanced filter fixes
